item.title: Deadly Hotel Fire at Turkish Ski Resort Stirs Grief and Outrage
item.description: Some had returned to the hotel year after year. Their deaths have stirred grief and outrage.

item.description: The defendants, all from Chile, are accused of participating in a South American crime group targeting multimillion-dollar homes, the authorities said...

item.title: From Day 1, Trump Tests the Limits of His Authority
item.description: It is unclear how much is left in Washington to restrain him.

item.title: The New Rules of the Trump Era
item.description: Ezra Klein and Aaron Retica discuss the oligarchic power dynamics of the second Trump administration.

item.title: Israel Presses Ahead With Raids in the West Bank
item.description: At least 10 people have been killed in the raids, according to the Palestinian Health Ministry. Dozens have been arrested, Palestinian officials told ...
